tarot-cards.name: The Fool
tarot-cards.meaning: Embarking on new beginnings

tarot-cards.name: The Magician
tarot-cards.meaning: Manifesting your own dreams and desires

tarot-cards.name: The High Priestess
tarot-cards.meaning: Look within and trust your own intuition

tarot-cards.name: The Empress
tarot-cards.meaning: Relax and allow yourself to be open to all forms of love

tarot-cards.name: The Emperor
tarot-cards.meaning: You're in control, so don't be afraid to take action

tarot-cards.name: The Hierophant
tarot-cards.meaning: Continue learning while also upholding your own values

tarot-cards.name: The Lovers
tarot-cards.meaning: You're in alignment with yourself, healthy relationships can blossom.

tarot-cards.name: The Chariot
tarot-cards.meaning: You're on the right path, be intentional and prepare to take action

tarot-cards.name: Strength
tarot-cards.meaning: Be confident and trust yourself when it comes to overcoming obstacles

tarot-cards.name: The Hermit
tarot-cards.meaning: Take some time to connect with your inner self

tarot-cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
tarot-cards.meaning: Embrace life's cycles of ups and downs to invite what's meant for you

tarot-cards.name: Justice
tarot-cards.meaning: Truth will be revealed in due time. Remain true to yourself.

tarot-cards.name: The Hanged Man
tarot-cards.meaning: Take a breath, reflect, and change your perspective on your situation.

tarot-cards.name: Death
tarot-cards.meaning: Embrace that a major transformation is afloat. Release what no longer serves you.

tarot-cards.name: Temperance
tarot-cards.meaning: Trust in divine timing.

tarot-cards.name: The Devil
tarot-cards.meaning: Confront the unhealthy behaviors that are present as the first step to healing.

tarot-cards.name: The Tower
tarot-cards.meaning: Sudden breakdowns and upheavals are occuring to bring in new opportunities.

tarot-cards.name: The Star
tarot-cards.meaning: Hope and healing from your situation are coming soon. Don't lose faith.

tarot-cards.name: The Moon
tarot-cards.meaning: Things once hidden are going to be revealed. Trust your intuition.

tarot-cards.name: The Sun
tarot-cards.meaning: You'll receive clarity on your situation, continue to be optimistic.

tarot-cards.name: Judgement
tarot-cards.meaning: Accepting what has happened in the past is necessary in order to move forward.

tarot-cards.name: The World
tarot-cards.meaning: A cycle is ending allowing for you to reap the rewards and begin a new journey.
